item.title: Angela add a quote by Shirley Jackson
item.description: "A pretty sight, a lady with a book." -- Shirley Jackson

item.title: Angela add a quote by Shirley Jackson
item.description: "My name is Mary Katherine Blackwood. I am eighteen years old, and I live with my sister Constance. I have often thought that with any luck at all, I could have been born a werewolf, because the two middle fingers on both my hands are the same length, but I have had to be content with what I had. I dislike washing myself, and dogs, and noise. I like my sister Constance, and Richard Plantagenet, and Amanita phalloides, the death-cup mushroom. Everyone else in our family is dead." -- Shirley Jackson

item.title: Angela add a quote by Shirley Jackson
item.description: "On the moon we wore feathers in our hair, and rubies on our hands. On the moon we had gold spoons." -- Shirley Jackson

item.title: Angela add a quote by Shirley Jackson
item.description: "You will be wondering about that sugar bowl, I imagine, is it still in use? You are wondering, has it been cleaned? You may very well ask, was it thoroughly washed?" -- Shirley Jackson

item.title: Angela add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "FEAR stands for fuck everything and run." -- Stephen King
